name: POLYMANIACS
description:
Chase, race, avoid, kill, collect, evade and ram your way to victory!
  • Complete a series of challenges to unlock new Vehicles, Stages and Party Games. 
  • Play Party Game tournaments against your mates and/or the AI.
  • Create your own scenarios in Sandbox mode.
  • Race against your ghost in Timetrial mode.
Features
  • 60 Challenges (1 Player)
  • 40 Party Games (1-4 Players)
  • Sandbox mode (1-4 Players)
  • Timetrial mode (1 Player)
  • 30 vehicles
  • 22 themed stages
  • Local multiplayer split screen
  • Custom physic engine
  • Minimalist, low-poly graphics
  • Gamepad and dual analog support
  • Configurable controls
System Requirements
  • 2gb Ram
  • 32mb Gfx Card
  • Gamepad or dual analog for multiplayer
  • Windows XP and above
